description: Public RFX Test FR SSC Public RFX Test- Amendment 000
full_summary:
================================

### 2023 Public RFX Test Tender Notification

#### Notice Summary

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites interested bidders to participate in a Request for Information (RFI) for the Public RFX Test. This notice summarizes the key points of the tender process.

#### Tender Details

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number (numéro de sollicitation) | BPM011577/13381 |
| Reference Number (numéro de référence) | SSC-23-00013381:T |
| Amendment Number (numéro de modification) | 0 |
| Publication Date (date de publication) | 24 April 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date (date de clôture de l'appel d'offres) | 19 August 2022 09:00:00 |

#### Procurement Information

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| Trade Agreements (accords commerciaux) | Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie) |
| Regions of Opportunity (régions d'opportunités) | British Columbia (Colombie-Britannique) |
| Regions of Delivery (régions de livraison) | Ontario (except NCR) (Ontario, sauf RCN) |

#### Contracting Entity Information

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity Name (nom de l'entité contractante) | Shared Services Canada (Services partagés Canada) |
| Contracting Entity Address | 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada |

#### Contact Information

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| Contact Name (nom du contact) | Supply Officer 2, Tester |
| Contact Email (courriel du contact) | None |
| Contact Phone (téléphone du contact) | 6139999999 |
| Contact Fax (tĂlefondue contact) | 6139999999 |

#### Notice and Attachment Information

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |

| Attachment (pièces jointes) | None |  |
